name: Weladhi Elder
text: If you control a FIRE monster, other than "Weladhi Elder", you can Special Summon this card (from your hand). If this card is in your GY (Quick Effect): You can banish this card, and if you do, Special Summon 1 "Weladhi" monster from your GY, but banish that card when it leaves the field. You can only use each effect of "Weladhi Elder" once per turn.
